siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Fox and Geese: Digital Agency Providing ML, Python, Node, React.js Engineering
siteMetadata.preamble: We're a Portland, Oregon-based team of data scientists and software engineers.
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: We develop exceptional products that meet real needs.
siteMetadata.postamble: Think we can help your project? We'd love to hear from you:

node.html: Deep Dive Duck uses AI to provide deep business insights extracted from changes detected across your competitor landscape.
Fluxguard enables sophisticated session orchestration to monitor your digital portfolio for defects, defacement, and other problematic content, code, and design changes.

Versionista provides regulatory, compliance, and data intelligence for the biggest companies in the world. Our web change intelligence platform utilizes state-of-the-art machine learning to detect, prioritize, and track insights from text and web data.
Enter top-level domains and key phrases you’re interested in. We’ll send you daily reports of pages where they’re added or removed.

We excel at complex product development.

We've brought products to market across the globe: both customer-facing and internal.

We particularly love leading and aligning multiple stakeholders in multi-region Enterprise initiatives (really!).

Our team of PhD data scientists leads the way in nimble machine learning insights generated from text.

We are experts in Natural Language Processing, including Named Entity Recognition; topic modeling with Latent Dirichlet Allocation and other techniques; abstractive and extractive summarization and Q&A; explainable ML; sentiment analysis; and much more.

• Python, Node.js, React.js, R, Java, and more
  • AI/ML experts in text analysis and NLP
  • Infrastructure as Code
  • NoOps / DevOps
  • AWS "everything": from Lambda to Fargate, to DynamoDB and beyond
  • Agile, Waterfall, and "wet agile" (bit of both!)
